alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 12 at 12:56AM CDT until October 12 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility a quarter of a mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Southeast St. Tammany, Northern St. Tammany and Southwestern St. Tammany Parishes. In Mississippi, Hancock County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The majority of the fog will mainly be confidned within 5 to 10 miles of the Pearl River on either side. In addition visibilities will likely increase quickly once the warm front moves north later this morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
